creator: tathagat25@hotmail.com
text:
In tomcat if we put the classes in the classes directory of the corresponding 
app, then tomcat automatically picks it up and puts it in the classpath. But! 
if a class wothout a package structure is put, it doesnt pick it up.! I think 
its pretty important to resolve this issue.

creator: remm@apache.org
text: This was fixed in 4.0.1-b1 or later.
